subtitle: Healthcare Facility Acquisitions
shortDescription: Track and manage healthcare facility acquisitions with AI-powered deal management.
fullDescription:
Acquisition Checklist is the comprehensive platform for healthcare facility acquisition teams. Track deals from pipeline through post-close, manage transition day checklists, analyze OTA agreements with AI, and coordinate your team in real-time.

Key Features:
• Deal Pipeline Management - Track SNF, ALF, ILF, Hospice, and In-Home acquisitions
• Smart Checklists - Templates for pre-close, transition day, and post-close phases
• AI Assistant - Get instant answers about deal status, blocked tasks, and team progress
• OTA Analysis - Upload and analyze Operations Transfer Agreements with AI
• Team Coordination - Assign team members, track presence, and communicate in real-time
• Reports & Analytics - Pipeline funnel, workstream progress, and team performance
• Offline Support - Access critical checklists even without connectivity

Built for acquisition teams managing SNF, ALF, ILF, Hospice, and In-Home facility transitions.
